metadata.title: CVE-2017-8108 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
Unspecified tests in Lynis before 2.5.0 allow local users to write toarbitrary files or possibly gain privileges via a symlink attack on atemporary file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8108` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lynis - 2.5.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: lynis package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.0-1').
